1649110.name: Glyph Demo
1649110.description:
Glyph’s gripping and addictive gameplay combines breathtaking aerial maneuvers with tranquil exploration in a new 3D platforming experience that has no peers. And now you can try it for yourself!

The Glyph DEMO includes three exclusive levels designed to teach the basics while also showing off some of the finest platforming elements of the game. Playtime is roughly 45 minutes with plenty of replay value as you tune your skills to perfection before the full Steam release of Glyph. Enjoy!
